import React from "react"; import classes from './Contact.module.css' import { Fade, Slide } from "react-awesome-reveal"; import { useState } from 'react'; type ContactProps = { productName: string setProductName: any } const Contact = (props: ContactProps) => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: '', phone: '', email: '', product_name: '' }) const changeHandler = (event: React.FormEvent) => { props.setProductName(event.target.value) setForm({ ...form, [event.currentTarget.name]: event.currentTarget.value }) } const showState = () => { console.log(form) } return (

); } export default Contact;
